item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Impactz, post:17, topic:422403”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=525071.msg3822168#msg3822168 date=1321892015]

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)); {

this?

yeah, if that doesn’t work try putting the { a line below.
[/quote]

still same errors :l[/quote]
Let me get my command for it and u can rip it… why not…

Edit

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			} // HERE?
			} // HERE?[/code]

item.title: How can i make Spawning available for everyone - Hybrid pvp v3 REP++PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:12, topic:422403”][quote author=Impactz link=topic=525071.msg3822144#msg3822144 date=1321889728]

Move the command into the ‘normal’ player commands section.

Where is the 'normal’player commands section could you help me via tv?

Lol look for something like this

public void playerCommands(Client c, String playerCommand) {

Doesn’t work can you please help with teamvieuwer pleaseeee?

lol. search “public void”
and if it says playercommands within that line, then add ur (“item”) command under it.

I Did it but it is still not working … it gives 26 errors :l

Lol, make sure u delete it from the Original spot it was at, and that it is spaced out and stuffs :3

then it gives 56 -.-----
can you just please help with tv pleaseeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!
[/quote]

Lol, it has to be ur coding then, and no im at school.[/quote]

IT Says:

src/server/model/players/packets/commands.java:578: ‘;’ expected
public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playercommand)

src/server/model/players/packets/commands.java:578: not a statement
public void DonatorCommands(Client c, String playercommand)

While compiling like 20 times :l

item.title: How can i make Spawning available for everyone - Hybrid pvp v3 REP++PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

What do i need to do to make spawning available for everyone?

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20500) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: (Ex:(::pickup_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))");
				}

Im dutch ^.^

Read full topic
